title: 10求单机指令MOD安装方法
author: 夜神月
txt_content:
本帖最后由 夜神月 于 2011-6-23 17:07 编辑 

求单机指令MOD安装方法和1.66SDK枪得方法！详细一点~~

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 well 于 2011-6-23 17:20 编辑 

看說明文件...

1. Go to the minecraft bin directory and backup minecraft.jar
2. Using 7zip or equally capable ZIP viewer open minecraft.jar
3. Delete the META-INF folder
4. Copy ALL the ".class" files contained within the mod to minecraft.jar, replacing the existing files.
5. Close minecraft.jar
6. Copy ALL the ".jar" files contained within the mod to the minecraft/bin directory (the same directory as minecraft.jar)

壓縮軟件打開 minecraft.jar 
刪除 META-INF
把MOD壓縮檔內所有".class"文件放入 minecraft.jar 
把MOD壓縮檔內所有".jar" 文件放入 .minecraft/bin 文件夾中

=====================
SDK GUN:

安裝 MODLoader 
安裝 MODLoaderMP
把MOD壓縮檔內“minecraft” 文件夾中的所有文件放入 minecraft.jar
 把MOD壓縮檔內“resources” 文件夾中的所有文件放入 .minecraft/resources 文件夾中 
mod_SdkGuns.properties 文件放入 .minecraft 文件夾中
